bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of sudden distension and pain affecting the heart and abdomen that cannot be removed by emetics or laxatives. SYDSF 8: 卒心腹脹滿，吐利不行，如乾 霍亂狀，世所謂衝惡是也 , “If one suddenly feels distension and fullness in his heart and abdomen, with neither vomiting or purging bringing relief, and if the appearance is that of dry cholera, this is generally called surging malignity ”.
